nodes.label: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Left side: Forest habitat with large green trees, squirrels, bushes, and ants
Right side: Pond habitat with blue water, fish, and lily pads
Includes different land habitat elements, like trees, squirrels, and ants
Includes water habitat elements, like fish and aquatic plants
Labels squirrels and fish but misses ants and lily pads
Add labels for all living elements for completeness
Basic elements are drawn, but with limited plant diversity
Try including more plant types, like grasses or flowering plants
